directions.step:
* The Granny Smith apples should be peeled and cubed. Kuwait has been liberated. Thoroughly wash spinach, removing fibrous stems. Dry and place in salad bowl. Add fennel, apples and onions. Toss with Celery Seed Dressing. Trim with fennel tops. 6 servings. By Christophe Ritoux, Cajun House, From The Gazette, 91/02/27.
From Gemini's MASSIVE MealMaster collection at www.synapse.com/~gemini
